query:
query Promotion($promotionCode: ID, $previewHash: String, $sort: String, $preload: Int, $lazyload: Boolean, $promotionTypeID: Int, $require: String, $disablesneakpeekhero: Boolean, $forcesneakpeekhero: Boolean, $nuepOpen: Boolean, $campaignid: String, $storeid: String, $storeref: String, $countryid: Int, $languageid: Int, $env: String, $pretailerid: String, $isDynamicV2: Boolean!) {
  dynamicpromotion(code: $promotionCode, imageWidth: 1200, previewHash: $previewHash, sort: $sort, promotionTypeID: $promotionTypeID, require: $require, disablesneakpeekhero: $disablesneakpeekhero, campaignid: $campaignid, storeid: $storeid, storeref: $storeref, countryid: $countryid, languageid: $languageid, env: $env, pretailerid: $pretailerid) @include(if: $isDynamicV2) {
    jsonstring
    listingsperpage(previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require) {
      listings
      napi
      __typename
    }
    specialevents(previewHash: $previewHash) {
      ...SpecialEventBase
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  promotion(code: $promotionCode, imageWidth: 1200, previewHash: $previewHash, sort: $sort, promotionTypeID: $promotionTypeID, require: $require, disablesneakpeekhero: $disablesneakpeekhero, forcesneakpeekhero: $forcesneakpeekhero, campaignid: $campaignid, storeid: $storeid, storeref: $storeref, countryid: $countryid, languageid: $languageid, env: $env) @skip(if: $isDynamicV2) {
    ...PromotionBase
    napicurrentpromo {
      url
      headers
      body
      __typename
    }
    rollovers(previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require) {
      id
      title
      deal
      finalPrice
      finePrint
      isCoupon
      buyOnlineLinkURL
      imageCommon: imageURL(imageWidth: 600, previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require)
      links(previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require) {
        ...LinksFields
        __typename
      }
      postStartDateString
      ...ListingIsSaved
      __typename
    }
    pages(imageWidth: 1200, previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require, nuepOpen: $nuepOpen) {
      id
      imageURL(previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require)
      template
      order
      hotspots(previewHash: $previewHash, preload: $preload, lazyload: $lazyload, require: $require) {
        id
        coordinates
        shapeID
        pageID
        listingId
        title
        linkURL
        linkTypeID
        description
        linkNewWindow
        listing(previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require) {
          ...ListingBase
          promotion {
            id
            __typename
          }
          store {
            id
            logos {
              logoURL
              __typename
            }
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        specialevent(previewHash: $previewHash) {
          ...SpecialEventBase
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment ListingBase on Listing {
  id
  imageURL(imageWidth: 325, previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require)
  originalDeal
  deal
  title
  finalPrice
  buyOnlineLinkURL
  saleStartDateString
  saleEndDateString
  postStartDateString
  postEndDateString
  previewPostStartDateString
  priceQualifier
  additionalDealInformation
  description
  productDescription
  customProductDescription
  finePrint
  onlineProductCode
  retailerProductCode
  languageID
  rating {
    id
    averageRating
    ratingRange
    reviewsURL
    totalReviews
    writeReviewURL
    __typename
  }
  store {
    id
    referenceNumber
    __typename
  }
  tags {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  departments {
    id
    name
    level
    __typename
  }
  napi
  __typename
}

fragment ListingIsSaved on Listing {
  __typename
}

fragment LinksFields on Links {
  id
  typeID
  imageURL(previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require)
  linkURL
  linkText
  displayOrder
  optionID
  __typename
}

fragment PromotionBase on Promotion {
  id
  title
  displayOrder
  saleStartDateString
  saleEndDateString
  postStartDateString
  postEndDateString
  previewPostStartDateString
  code
  typeID
  isSneakPeek
  isHero
  retailer {
    id
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment SpecialEventBase on Specialevent {
  id
  imageURL(previewHash: $previewHash)
  linkURL
  title
  linkNewWindow
  typeID
  description
  displayOrder
  __typename
}
